metadata.title: RL78 Family: Positioning of Renesas Ready Network and Preferred Partner Program

sections.content:
Question:
How is Renesas Ready Network differentiated from the Preferred Partner Program?
Answer:
Renesas Ready Partner Network primarily provides software building blocks, while the Preferred Partner Program proposes partners who can provide hardware that complements the Renesas Ready Partner Network.
  Suitable Products
RA Family
RL78 Family
RX Family
